body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
https://dl.acm.org/doi/pdf/10.1007/s00778-015-0409-y shows some really great performance numbers for doing string matching on GPUs. It would be great if we could look into using it to speed up some string operations, like contains, or more generically the LIKE command for a literal pattern.

comments.body: Hello @res-life, thank you for studying this item. Would you please first try to implement KMP for strings "LIKE"? We think that KMP could be useful for strings columns where the string length varies a lot (10-10K characters).

title: [FEA] explore using KMP for string matching like operations
